```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
library(here)
```

```{r}
kuli_rain = read.csv(here("data", ("KuliRain_20210512.csv"))) %>% select(-X)

kuli_rain$date <- as_datetime(kuli_rain$date)

kuli_rain_tidy <- kuli_rain %>% mutate(year = year(date), 
                                       month = month(date), 
                                       day = day(date), 
                                       hour = hour(date))

kuli_rain_daily <- kuli_rain_tidy %>% 
  group_by(year, month,day) %>% 
  summarise(
    daily_pcp = sum(rain)
  ) %>% 
    mutate(date = make_date(year, month, day)) %>% 
  mutate(daily_pcp = daily_pcp/25.4)

kuli_plot_pcp <- ggplot(kuli_rain_daily, aes(date, daily_pcp)) +
  geom_line(color = "blue") + 
  labs(x= "Year", y="Precipitation (in)", title = "Kuli'ou'ou Ridge Rainfall") + 
  theme_minimal() 

kuli_plot_pcp
```
